pageProduct.name: Swisse Organic Spirulina 1000mg 200 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse High Strength Organic Spirulina is a premium quality formula containing organic spirulina, a green superfood that provides a natural source of vitamins, minerals and antioxidants to support normal energy production, immune function, bone structure and a healthy nervous system. Nutrient Dense: Spirulina is a microscopic blue-green algae wholefood, which is a source of chlorophyll, iron, thiamine, riboflavin, vitamins B6 and B12, as well as vitamin K, selenium and antioxidants.
Energy Support: Iron and thiamine support healthy energy production. Iron, vitamins B6 and B12 assist with the reduction of tiredness and fatigue. Immune Support: Iron, selenium, vitamins B6 and B12 contribute to healthy immune function.
Bone Health: Vitamin K contributes to healthy bone structure.
Antioxidant: Spirulina is a source of antioxidants and selenium to help
protect cells against potential free radical damage.
Source of Chlorophyll: The green pigment found in plants, chlorophyll is responsible for absorbing light from the sun and transforming it into energy. Swisse High Strength Organic Spirulina can be taken daily or as part of a healthy detox to support general health and wellbeing.
Swisse High Strength Organic Spirulina
provides a wholefood source of nutrients
in a convenient, high strength dose.

Lifestyle Claim: Vegan| Vegetarian

Size: 200 Pack

Serving Size: 3.05 g (3 tablets)

Servings Per Pack: Approx. 66

Warnings

Do not use if cap seal is broken.

Ingredients

Organic Spirulina powder (98.5%), silicon dioxide,
magnesium stearate.

Directions

SERVING SUGGESTION
ADULT SERVE: 3 tablets daily.
The nutrition and benefits outlined can be obtained with 1 serve
(3 tablets). You can take up to 3 serves daily if you choose to boost your nutrition further.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C. Avoid storage in direct sunlight or heat.
Do not use if cap seal is broken.
